common.application.runtime.environment

Class ApplicationRuntimeEnv

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.CObject
      • common.runtime.environment.RuntimeEnv
        • common.application.runtime.environment.ApplicationRuntimeEnv

  • public class ApplicationRuntimeEnv
extends RuntimeEnv
    The ApplicationRuntimeEnv class is a class for managing and parsing common command line argument(s) for an application.
    Author:
    Vincent Mirian
    Date:
    Nov 20, 2017
